error.any:
something went wrong : `$[name]=$[message]`
if this happens again please report to the developer
error.critical:
something went **REALLY** wrong : `$[name]=$[message]`
please report to the developer
error.system.wrongjs:
something went wrong : `$[name]=$[message]`
if this happens again please report to the developer
check.god.not: **Nop!** You dont have the god power.
cmd.claim.fail.already: **nop!** You have alread a death note.
cmd.claim.fail.color.young: *you cant pick this color for your first death note*
cmd.claim.fail.color.poor: You don't have enough apples to convince me... Just, take the black one.
cmd.claim.confirm.color.red: The red one is pretty rare, you have to deserve it.
cmd.claim.confirm.color.white: The white one is extremly rare, you have to deserve it.
cmd.burn.already: *you burned a book, but it wasn't the death note*
cmd.burn.confirm:
*you ligth up a match... üß®*
**Wait!**
Human, are you really going to burn your death note and everything you have in it?
Afterall, if you really want to, do it.
cmd.burn.cancel:
*you ligth off the match*
Playing with fire could be dangerous, but that is fun.
cmd.burn.expired: *the match went out in the meantime*
cmd.burn.done:
**You burned your death note.** üî•üî•üî•
Well, see you later human
*The shinigami disappears*
cmd.apples.claim.murderer: you killed **$[victim]**, murder of $[kill] human being! **+$[added]**
cmd.apples.claim.harmless: you killed **$[victim]**, a pretty harmless guy **+$[added]**
cmd.best.get.apple.title: apples leaderboard :

cmd.rules.english: I've copy the rules of the death note in english, the most spoke human language.
cmd.lang.define.set: Ok, now I speak **english** to you.
cmd.kira.fail.channel: you cannot use your death note here
cmd.kira.fail.isdead: you can't kill someone who isn't alive
cmd.kira.fail.maxcombo: you can not continue a combo above **$[max]** exchanges
cmd.kira.fail.remind: you remind me that I sould have killed them
cmd.kira.fail.text.max: this is too long to be written
cmd.kira.fail.time.max: you cannot schuled for more than $[time]
cmd.kira.start.mp.victim:
someone used the death note on you!
you have **$[time]** to kill them before and avoid dying
cmd.kira.warn.nomp: :warning: <@$[userId]> was not informed because their mp are closed
cmd.kira.fail.shini: well tried, but a god of death can't be killed by a death note.
cmd.kira.fail.edit: but you are already killing them
cmd.kira.fail.burn.attacker: but you burned you death note
cmd.kira.fail.burn.victim: your your opponent burned their death note
cmd.kira.finish.attacker.count: it's the $[number]th time you killed them
cmd.know.fail.expired: I don't remember it anymore, it was too long ago.
cmd.know.fail.poor: You don't have enough apples to convince me...
cmd.know.get.who: Yum! The name of your killer begin with a **$[wh]**.   `-$[price]üçé`
cmd.know.get.where: Yum! It happened at a channel named **$[wh]**.   `-$[price]üçé`
cmd.know.get.delmsg: Yum! This message is no longer there.   `-$[price]üçé`
cmd.know.get.fullwho: Yum! It's **$[wh]** who writte your name.   `-$[price]üçé`
